alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:11PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Harding County through 815 PM MDT... At 710 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Camp Crook to 5 miles southwest of West Short Pines. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Harding, Ludlow, Camp Crook, Ladner, East Short Pines, West Short Pines, Table Mountain, South Cave Hills, North Cave Hills and Lake Gardner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
